free.question: Is QuizMaster free to use?
free.answer: Yes! QuizMaster offers a generous free tier with all essential features. Premium features are available for power users.

export.question: Can I export quiz results?
export.answer: Absolutely! You can export results in various formats including PDF and CSV for further analysis.

participants.question: How many participants can take a quiz?
participants.answer: There's no limit! Our platform is designed to handle unlimited participants for each quiz.
